body: `kernel_size` needs to be added for `accGradParameters` to know weight sizes in case `gradWeight` is `NULL`. The way THNN bindings work is that it assumes `updateOutput`, `updateGradInput` and `accGradParameters` use a similar argument list. So I need to add `kernel_size` at all three places in THNN. In ATen, they are handled by the generated code mostly.

In ATen, they are handled by the generated code mostly.
